name: agent-api-testing-platform
description: AI Agent API Testing and Evaluation Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.db:push: cd server && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install && npx prisma generate
